svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - February 10 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
February 10, 2024" date: "2024-02-09"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
‚Ä¢ Latest all core devs ‚Äì consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Mainnet Dencun
upgrade set for March 13 epoch 269568 , client releases in 2 weeks Goerli testnet : tested blob expiry
with nodes using checkpoint sync Invalid blocks : triggering MEV-Boost circuit breaker to local
building discussion Electra upgrade scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024): Priorities &
complexities of potential features: SSZification EIPs, ePBS, inclusion lists (EIP7547) and increase
max EB (EIP7251); breakout calls planned peerDAS (EIP7594) can be developed in parallel to Electra
Latest all core devs ‚Äì consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
‚Ä¢ Mainnet Dencun upgrade set for March 13 epoch 269568 , client releases in 2 weeks
Mainnet Dencun upgrade set for March 13 epoch 269568 , client releases in 2 weeks
‚Ä¢ Goerli testnet : tested blob expiry with nodes using checkpoint sync
Goerli testnet : tested blob expiry with nodes using checkpoint sync
‚Ä¢ Invalid blocks : triggering MEV-Boost circuit breaker to local building discussion
Invalid blocks : triggering MEV-Boost circuit breaker to local building discussion
‚Ä¢ Electra upgrade scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024): Priorities & complexities of
potential features: SSZification EIPs, ePBS, inclusion lists (EIP7547) and increase max EB (EIP7251);
breakout calls planned peerDAS (EIP7594) can be developed in parallel to Electra
Electra upgrade scope (small cross layer fork targeting late 2024):
‚Ä¢ Priorities & complexities of potential features: SSZification EIPs, ePBS, inclusion lists (EIP7547)
and increase max EB (EIP7251); breakout calls planned
Priorities & complexities of potential features: SSZification EIPs, ePBS, inclusion lists (EIP7547)
‚Ä¢ peerDAS (EIP7594) can be developed in parallel to Electra
peerDAS (EIP7594) can be developed in parallel to Electra
‚Ä¢ Hole≈°ky testnet uneventfully upgraded to Dencun
Hole≈°ky testnet uneventfully upgraded to Dencun
‚Ä¢ Dencun interop testing call video : testing churn limit on Hole≈°ky testnet & shadowfork planned with
mainnet releases
Dencun interop testing call video : testing churn limit on Hole≈°ky testnet & shadowfork planned with
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
‚Ä¢ üö® Lido at 31.59% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
üö® Lido at 31.59% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
‚Ä¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 72% supermajority , could cause a
chain split Supermajority dashboard : simulate node operators changing to minority clients Consensus
layer: Prysm 39%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth 72% supermajority , could cause a chain split Supermajority dashboard :
simulate node operators changing to minority clients
Execution layer: Geth 72% supermajority , could cause a chain split
‚Ä¢ Supermajority dashboard : simulate node operators changing to minority clients
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 39%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 39%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
‚Ä¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
‚Ä¢ Toni Wahrst√§tter & Vitalik: options to increase block gas limit via increasing calldata cost;
incentivize L2s to use blobs for data availability
Toni Wahrst√§tter & Vitalik: options to increase block gas limit via increasing calldata cost;
‚Ä¢ bloXroute relay in optimistic mode broadcast invalid blocks built by rsync builder on Feb 6
resulting in 9 missed slots
bloXroute relay in optimistic mode broadcast invalid blocks built by rsync builder on Feb 6 resulting
in 9 missed slots
‚Ä¢ Reth roadmap (EL client in Rust): targeting v0.2 beta late Feb & v1 production by end of April
Reth roadmap (EL client in Rust): targeting v0.2 beta late Feb & v1 production by end of April
Research
‚Ä¢ Overview of spec changes for inclusion lists
Client releases
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.15.1 : hotfixes for Besu users, blindedLocal & lock file issues
Consensus layer:
‚Ä¢ Lodestar v1.15.1 : hotfixes for Besu users, blindedLocal & lock file issues
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth v1.13.12 : mainnet Dencun upgrade Era1 initial implementation , provides
Execution Layer data history pre-merge; post-merge Execution Layer data is encapsulated within Beacon
chain Era files Reth v0.1.0-alpha.17 : critical fixes for Dencun, sidechain root validation &
networking improvements
Execution layer:
‚Ä¢ Geth v1.13.12 : mainnet Dencun upgrade Era1 initial implementation , provides Execution Layer data
history pre-merge; post-merge Execution Layer data is encapsulated within Beacon chain Era files
Geth v1.13.12 : mainnet Dencun upgrade
‚Ä¢ Era1 initial implementation , provides Execution Layer data history pre-merge; post-merge Execution
Layer data is encapsulated within Beacon chain Era files
‚Ä¢ Reth v0.1.0-alpha.17 : critical fixes for Dencun, sidechain root validation & networking
improvements
Reth v0.1.0-alpha.17 : critical fixes for Dencun, sidechain root validation & networking improvements
For stakers
‚Ä¢ Remy Roy: guide to migrating a validator to a larger disk
Layer 2
‚Ä¢ Polygon Type 1 Prover open sourced
Polygon Type 1 Prover open sourced
‚Ä¢ RollCall (L2 standards) precompiles breakout call and notes : secp256r1 precompile (RIP7212) live on
Polygon testnet and rollup precompile registry in progress
RollCall (L2 standards) precompiles breakout call and notes : secp256r1 precompile (RIP7212) live on
EIPs/Standards
‚Ä¢ EIPs: EIP7612 : State storage transition using an overlay tree EIP7619 : Precompile Falcon512
generic verifier
EIPs:
‚Ä¢ EIP7612 : State storage transition using an overlay tree
EIP7612 : State storage transition using an overlay tree
‚Ä¢ EIP7619 : Precompile Falcon512 generic verifier
EIP7619 : Precompile Falcon512 generic verifier
‚Ä¢ RIPs (Rollup Improvement Proposals): RIP7614 : Expose call stack to contracts
RIPs (Rollup Improvement Proposals):
‚Ä¢ RIP7614 : Expose call stack to contracts
‚Ä¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7613 : Puppet proxy contract ERC7615 : Atomic push-based data feed
among contracts ERC7616 : Hybrid fungible token ERC7617 : Chunk support for ERC5219 mode in web3 URL
ERC7618 : Content encoding in ERC5219 mode web3 URL
ERCs (application layer):
‚Ä¢ ERC7613 : Puppet proxy contract
ERC7613 : Puppet proxy contract
‚Ä¢ ERC7615 : Atomic push-based data feed among contracts
ERC7615 : Atomic push-based data feed among contracts
‚Ä¢ ERC7616 : Hybrid fungible token
ERC7616 : Hybrid fungible token

ERC7617 : Chunk support for ERC5219 mode in web3 URL
‚Ä¢ ERC7618 : Content encoding in ERC5219 mode web3 URL
Stuff for developers
‚Ä¢ EthereumJS releases : Dencun upgrade support, WASM used by default for crypto primitives,
RPCStateManager, expanded EIP1186 proof functionality and Tx addSignature API
EthereumJS releases : Dencun upgrade support, WASM used by default for crypto primitives,
‚Ä¢ Gaslite Merkle Drop base contracts: GasliteMerkleDN (native tokens) & GasliteMerkleDT (ERC20)
Gaslite Merkle Drop base contracts: GasliteMerkleDN (native tokens) & GasliteMerkleDT (ERC20)
‚Ä¢ Ethers js v6.11.0 : adds EIP4844 blob transactions
Ethers js v6.11.0 : adds EIP4844 blob transactions
‚Ä¢ Ethers-kt (Kotlin): async library for EVM interaction, targets JVM & Android platforms
Ethers-kt (Kotlin): async library for EVM interaction, targets JVM & Android platforms
Ecosystem
‚Ä¢ Ethereum Protocol Fellowship study group , 10 week series starts Feb 19, research & development
tracks, precursor to fifth cohort
Ethereum Protocol Fellowship study group , 10 week series starts Feb 19, research & development
‚Ä¢ Ethereum Foundation academic grants round , $1M available
Ethereum Foundation academic grants round , $1M available
Job Listings
‚Ä¢ Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here
Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here

Nethermind: Distributed System Engineer (DSE) and Cryptography Researcher

EF seek an Executive Assistant to support senior decision makers

MetaMask Staking: Staff Software Engineer and Software Engineer
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
‚Ä¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9.4 to 367 gwei, with 35.2 gwei average Zero net issuance
currently at 22.2 gwei 10.1k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9.4 to 367 gwei, with 35.2 gwei average
‚Ä¢ Zero net issuance currently at 22.2 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.2 gwei

10.1k ETH net burn this week
‚Ä¢ ETHUSD : $2,279 - $2,522, currently $2,495
ETHUSD : $2,279 - $2,522, currently $2,495
‚Ä¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
‚Ä¢ GoDaddy integrated with ENS, users can associate an address with their domain name
GoDaddy integrated with ENS, users can associate an address with their domain name
‚Ä¢ POAP Collections : curate groups of POAPs
POAP Collections : curate groups of POAPs
‚Ä¢ Kain Warwick: Synthetix 2024 roadmap

‚Ä¢ Brice reflects on app governance upon leaving GHO liquidity committee
Brice reflects on app governance upon leaving GHO liquidity committee
‚Ä¢ Gitcoin Grants proposed updates : refocus on open source software & ETH infrastructure with rounds
every 6 months & $1M matching pool, communities can run their own web3 community & education rounds
Gitcoin Grants proposed updates : refocus on open source software & ETH infrastructure with rounds
Regulation/business/tokens
‚Ä¢ SEC ‚Äúdealer‚Äù rule finalized , excludes those with/controlling less than $50M in assets

Jake Chervinsky: state of crypto vs SEC
‚Ä¢ Kain Warwick: SEC response to ICOs created worse outcomes than if they had done nothing

General
‚Ä¢ Josh Stark: Trust Experience shape expectations of future blockchain behavior
Josh Stark: Trust Experience shape expectations of future blockchain behavior
